description: This file provides a function 'runPreview' that creates and manages a sandboxed iframe for rendering user HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It handles communication via postMessage, includes a timeout mechanism, and manages cleanup.

methods.name: runPreview({ container, html, css, js, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError })
methods.description: Creates a sandboxed iframe to render user-supplied HTML, CSS, and JS, manages communication, timeout, and cleanup.

ctags.name: runPreview
ctags.pattern: /^export function runPreview({ container, html, css, js, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError/
ctags.signature: ({ container, html, css, js, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError })
